h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: Another Falcon Guai will appear not far up on the left side between two much larger trees, but apart from these enemies the rest of this sloping forest is largely devoid of enemies. Be sure to check behind the trees where he appeared to absorb another green Wisp.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Snow-Veiled Trail'.
The content is as follows:
Another Falcon Guai will appear not far up on the left side between two much larger trees, but apart from these enemies the rest of this sloping forest is largely devoid of enemies. Be sure to check behind the trees where he appeared to absorb another green Wisp.
